metadata.Title: CVE-2021-33515 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The submission service in Dovecot before 2.3.15 allows STARTTLS command injection in lib-smtp. Sensitive information can be redirected to an attacker-controlled address.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2021-33515` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

dovecot-auth-lua - 2.3.13+dfsg1-1ubuntu2
dovecot-core - 2.3.13+dfsg1-1ubuntu2
dovecot-gssapi - 2.3.13+dfsg1-1ubuntu2
dovecot-imapd - 2.3.13+dfsg1-1ubuntu2
dovecot-ldap - 2.3.13+dfsg1-1ubuntu2
dovecot-lmtpd - 2.3.13+dfsg1-1ubuntu2
dovecot-lucene - 2.3.13+dfsg1-1ubuntu2
dovecot-managesieved - 2.3.13+dfsg1-1ubuntu2
dovecot-mysql - 2.3.13+dfsg1-1ubuntu2
dovecot-pgsql - 2.3.13+dfsg1-1ubuntu2
dovecot-pop3d - 2.3.13+dfsg1-1ubuntu2
dovecot-sieve - 2.3.13+dfsg1-1ubuntu2
dovecot-solr - 2.3.13+dfsg1-1ubuntu2
dovecot-sqlite - 2.3.13+dfsg1-1ubuntu2
dovecot-submissiond - 2.3.13+dfsg1-1ubuntu2
No subscription required

advisory.DiscoveredBy: Fabian Ising and Damian Poddebniak of MÃ¼nster University of Applied Sciences

criterions.comment: dovecot package in impish was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.3.13+dfsg1-1ubuntu2').
